sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content: など means "and so on", "etc.", "such as" - indicates examples from a larger group.

children.heading: 1. Examples (And So On)
children.content: 犬や猫など "dogs, cats, etc." 本やペンなど "books, pens, and so on" りんごやバナナなど "apples, bananas, and such"

children.heading: 2. Humble/Modest (With 私)
children.content: 私など "someone like me" (humble) 私などには無理です "it's impossible for someone like me"

children.heading: 3. Dismissive "Such As"
children.content: そんなことなど "such things" (dismissive) お金など要らない "don't need money and such"

sections.heading: Common Pattern
sections.content: [A]や[B]など 犬や猫など "dogs, cats, etc." 本やペンやノートなど "books, pens, notebooks, etc."

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ "And so on/etc." ✓ Lists examples ✓ Humble expression ✓ Often with や

Related:

や (ya) - Partial List と (to) - Complete List
